Gangon:

"sorry! i do not want to fail Hell Beast, he may get sad....and i don't want
that! he may get mad, too! and nobody wants that! no!....the lord may do
anything when he's mad!......" Gangon runs up a tree and down the other
side... "i could see that one coming!...." he said turning his head toward
BrightBlade...wham! he runs into another tree.... "whoops! heh heh!" he
said....climbing to his feet....he stopped by a pond and took a dring before
running back up to her..... "now my legs will stay long! heehee!..." he
said... (spider fact...) he closed his eyes, but dodged a tree anyway
because he could feel it coming.. "so, what did you do before i met you?" he
said to BrightBlade.......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 21, 2000 4:40 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> BrightBlade, Rage
>
> * BrightBlade sighed and whacked her bushy tail across Gangon's face,
there
> was no time for things like that now!*
>
> " Stop daydreaming, I can't wait for you every time you run into a tree!
We
> have a mission to complete and we're going to complete it weather it kills
> us or not! There is no way in the Inferno that I'm going to report failure
> to Hell Beast. Now, come on!"
>
> * BrightBlade keeps her scanners on full as she continues to run in the
> direction that she knew Megatron was in, she was soon picking up his foul
> smell! She had him now!*
>
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
>
> *Rage walked within 1 yard of the Ark then stopped, it was huge and very
> intimidating to her!
> Perhaps it was one bug, cold smelling creature that was waiting for her to
> come close then would snatch her up in it's mouth and swallow her whole?!!
> She snarled as she sniffed at it, or was it just a big rock?
> Rage paced and kept her eye on it, not sure if she should advance.*
>
>
